text_block_list.text:
At the summer camp, Air Groove had been doing 
beach running for the past few days.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Fu… I ran 20kms before I even realized it.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I can handle this distance pretty easily now. Because 
the sand is unstable you can train your physical 
strength and core at the same time.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
When it comes to dirt training, it doesn't get better 
than this. I'm in great condition, I feel like no 
matter who I'm against I can't lose一Hm?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …Not good. The summer festival is already starting.

Come to think of it, she was supposed to go to the summer 
festival as part of her student council activities…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
There are plenty of students who aren't used to the 
sudden change in environment outside of school. It's 
for their safety, I have to get going.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I don't mind but… I'm only going for work.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: If you understand that much. Then come.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Cotton candy, takoyaki, candy carrots… Good grief, the temptation 
for students in training is too strong.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I told you I'm only here for work, fool! 
Do you have memory loss!?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I have absolutely no intention of… Hm?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Uwah! U-Um, this is bothersome…!

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text:
Just a little okay? I wanna photograph you! You guys are from 
Tracen aren't you? You're practically future stars!
Some reporter is flashing his camera on the students…!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: How persistent.

The situation getting on Air Groove's nerves worried me and 
without realizing it, I took a step forward.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…Fu. 
It's fine, I'll go.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Trainer, just wait here and watch.
With those words, Air Groove approached the reporter.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, you reporter there.

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text: Eh? Wha… are you by chance… the "Empress" Air Groove?!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'm not sure who you work for, but our school has a rule that you 
need permission for interviews.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
This is a rule made to protect the identities and futures of our 
students. Would you please understand?

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text:
Ah, please excuse me… 
I work for a magazine that features horse girls so…

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text:
My hobby sort of became my job, so seeing prestigious horse 
girls, I just got carried away…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Your support is a large encouragement to us.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
And that is why, we request you apply for an interview 
through the normal means. If it's an official 
interview we will gladly accept.

The reporter seemed satisfied with Air Groove's calm intervention 
and apologized before leaving.

Air Groove's calm approach was different from before, and left a 
deep impression on me……

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Alright, it's just about time for me to swap 
out for patrol. Work is just about done.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It'd be fine to just return to the dorms now but一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hm. Fireworks, huh.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…Alright, come. 
I know a good spot.

From the hill grounds, I could see the night view 
of the city. Away from the crowd of the summer festival, 
only the sounds of fireworks echoed.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That flower too, finally bloomed thanks to the efforts of those 
around it. It's truly something to learn from.
choice_data_list: If it's you, I think even fireworks will bloom
If it's you, I think even fireworks will bloom

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Flowers for the sky… huh. It won't be easy. 
But, surely someday一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Ah… but even so一they're beautiful.

Air Groove narrows her eyes after saying that. 
The colors of the fireworks reflecting in her eyes.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Fu, just where are you looking?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hey you, don't blush at that. It makes me… um, feel awkward too.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
……It seems like the fireworks are over now. This time, let's 
actually return to the dorms.
After saying that, she hurriedly started walking but一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Ah…

Air Groove fell, probably by getting 
herself caught in the stone steps.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hmph, something like this is of no conce一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: No, actually.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Do you think you could carry me?

I kneeled in front of her and picked 
her up from the heel she fell on.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ……Hey.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Just stay as you are, and answer me this,

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: In your eyes, just how is my figure reflected?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ……I see. Then, I'll continue to carry myself proudly.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Your reliability, is still far from blooming. 
…But, it's not as if I'm not anticipating your future growth.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'll continue to support you with all I can. As long as you don't 
neglect your efforts to stand by my side, I will continue to lead 
you to the crown as "Empress".

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ……Also, hurry up and carry my shoes.

She smiled proudly and looked even more 
beautiful than the day we first met……
